metadata.Title: CVE-2013-5855 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Oracle Mojarra 2.2.x before 2.2.6 and 2.1.x before 2.1.28 does not perform appropriate encoding when a (1) <h:outputText> tag or (2) EL expression is used after a scriptor style block, which allows remote attackers to conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks via application-specific vectors.

criterions.comment: mojarra: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
